verbs.description: [ARG0: aurora cannabis] [V: applies] [ARG1: to list on the new york stock exchange canadian cannabis company aurora cannabis] announced that it has filed an application to be listed on the new york stock exchange under the ticker symbol acb the same ticker the stock trades under on the toronto stock exchange the company will also continue to trade on the otcqx under the ticker symbol acbff canada otcqx ceo aurora new york stock exchange cannabis aurora cannabis new york terry booth stock exchange toronto stock exchange nyse stock
